nodes.text: The MV-2 messenger unit was a type of droid that was used during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

During the time of the Clone Wars, the Jedi Master Yoda sent an MV-2 messenger unit to meet a Jedi Padawan inside the Jedi Temple on Coruscant, and send the Padawan to speak with Yoda in the temple's High Council Chamber. The droid escorted the Padawan to the chamber and once Yoda had finished briefing the individual, beckoned to the Padawan to follow it. The droid then told the Jedi to leave from spaceport H1 immediately, and that a starship was waiting there for the Padawan.
